cast.name: 克劳迪奥·阿巴多 Claudio Abbado

this_title: “Please call me Claudio”: The Visionary Claudio Abbado
trans_title: "请叫我克劳迪奥"：梦想家克劳迪奥·阿巴多
introduction: An artist with great charisma: Claudio Abbado not only shaped the Berliner Philharmoniker as chief conductor from 1990 to 2002, but also laid invaluable foundations for orchestral culture through his work with youth orchestras. The documentary provides moving insights into his work and above all shows Claudio Abbado the man, who in all modesty preferred to be called simply “Claudio”.
chinese_title: "请叫我克劳迪奥"：梦想家克劳迪奥·阿巴多
foreign_title: “Please call me Claudio”: The Visionary Claudio Abbado
